title: Sleep log
description: Each entry records one sleep episode which can be the main sleep event at night or a nap.

in_bed_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when person went to bed for the main sleep event at night or a nap.

in_bed_timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when person went to bed for the main sleep event at night or a nap.

out_of_bed_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when person got up from bed for the main sleep event at night or a nap.

out_of_bed_timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when person got up from bed for the main sleep event at night or a nap.

sleep_total_minutes.description: the amount of time, in minutes, spent asleep during the sleep episode.

awakening_count.description: the number of times a person awoke from sleep after sleep onset and before final awakening.

awakening_total_minutes.description: total time in minutes that a person remained awake after sleep onset and before final awakening.

sleep_onset_duration_minutes_avg.description: average of minutes elapsed in the transition from wakefulness to falling asleep.

slept well.description: Commentary regarding how the person feels they slept on the specified date.

easy_wakeup.description: The person woke up and got out of bed easily and with little resistance.
